name: UpdateLandingPageLanguages
description:
Update languages for landing pages in a multi-language group.

This tool explicitly sets new languages for each landing page within a specified multi-language group. Use it when you need to modify the language settings of your HubSpot CMS landing pages.

parameters.name: update_languages_request
parameters.description: JSON containing 'languages' map (object IDs to languages) and 'primaryId' (ID of primary object).

languages.description: Map of object IDs to associated languages of object in the multi-language group.

primaryId.description: ID of the primary object in the multi-language group.

value_schema.description: The JSON representation of the UpdateLanguagesRequest object.
